objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#f5f5f7;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#e8e8e8;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#a0a0a0;stop-opacity:0.2'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#f0f0f0;stop-opacity:0.2'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='20' stroke='#d1d1d6' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='15' stroke='#d1d1d6' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/><path d='M100,100 L980,100 L980,980 L100,980 Z' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.7' rx='10'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M0,0 C100,50 200,0 300,50 C400,100 500,50 600,100 C700,150 800,100 900,150 C1000,200 1080,150 1080,200 L1080,0 L0,0 Z' fill='#86b2e0' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M0,1080 C100,1030 200,1080 300,1030 C400,980 500,1030 600,980 C700,930 800,980 900,930 C1000,880 1080,930 1080,880 L1080,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='#86b2e0' opacity='0.1'/><rect x='120' y='120' width='840' height='840' rx='8' stroke='#e0e0e0' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Complete Apple ecosystem in one package
• Stunning Retina & high-resolution displays
• Seamless integration with iCloud
• Ideal for students, professionals & creatives

product_details.name: Apple Premium Device Bundle - MacBook Pro, iPad & iPhone Combo
product_details.description:
• Complete Apple ecosystem: MacBook Pro, iPad, and iPhone in one package
• MacBook Pro featuring Retina Display with stunning visual clarity
• Sleek aluminum unibody design across all devices
• Seamless integration between devices with iCloud and Continuity features
• MacBook Pro with backlit keyboard and Force Touch trackpad
• iPad with high-resolution display, perfect for creative work and entertainment
• iPhone with Touch ID for enhanced security
• Latest iOS and macOS operating systems pre-installed
• Powerful performance for professional work and everyday tasks
• Perfect starter kit for Apple ecosystem enthusiasts
• Ideal for students, professionals, and creative individuals
• All devices in pristine condition with original packaging

banner_details:
This banner features a clean and modern design showcasing a premium Apple product bundle. The composition includes a bold heading (`heading`) in deep gray, promoting the offer. Below it, a stylish subheading (`subheading`) in soft blue uses uppercase text to list the Apple devices included. A light blue decorative line (`decorative`) separates titles from a bullet-point description (`description`) detailing the bundle's features.

The center showcases a product image (`product_image`) featuring a MacBook, iPad, and iPhone, visually emphasizing the offering. The bottom portion displays the price (`price`) in bold, dark type, and a rectangular blue call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with "SHOP NOW" text (`cta`) in white.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Gradient Gray Background: `#f5f5f7` to `#e8e8e8`
- Title Text: `#1d1d1f`
- Subheading and Accent Line: `#86b2e0`
- Button Fill: `#0071e3`
- Button Text: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image showcases a MacBook, iPad, and iPhone in a minimalist setup. The dominant color palette combines sleek metallic silver (#C0C0C0) from the device bodies with deep black (#1C1C1C) from the keyboard and screen bezels. The screens introduce visually appealing hues: soft pastel pinks (#E9AEBB) and purples (#AA88BA) from the sunset on the MacBook display blend with cool blues (#4A90E2) and whites (#FFFFFF) seen on the iPad and iPhone wallpapers. This contrast highlights clarity and premium design while maintaining harmony across the devices. For advertisement banners, using this palette will evoke elegance, innovation, and sophistication.
